overview:
Bhagaban is the founder and CEO of NoiseStreet - An interactive Out-of-home advertising startup , based in Singapore .

Bhagaban founded NoiseStreet in 2011 with a vision to add a layer of interactivity on top of the world. NoiseStreet aims to bridge the gap between online and offline - be it in malls ,airports , museums , events or even classrooms . He has managed to form a team of other skilled cofounders , advisors and mentors . With some pilot customers already testing the platform, NoiseStreet is about to soar high in the world . Bhagaban , as the current CEO is responsible for company vision, product strategy , partnerships , client relationships and fund raising.

Bhagaban graduated out of IIT Kharagpur, one of the premier engineering institutes in India . He also took NoiseStreet through Adeo Ressi’s Founder Institute . Before NoiseStreet , Bhagaban worked for Barclays Capital , Singapore for 2.5 years - where he worked in several teams - Equities , FX Derivatives , New Product Services - where he worked on development of cutting edge technologies for the investment bank.
